triples.name: Speech synthesis
triples.relevance: FastPitch addresses the core task of converting text into spoken audio with improved expressiveness and quality.

triples.name: Transformer (deep learning)
triples.relevance: FastPitch is built on a fully-parallel Transformer architecture that enables efficient parallel processing of speech synthesis.

triples.name: Fundamental frequency
triples.relevance: FastPitch conditions speech generation on fundamental frequency contours to improve expressiveness and naturalness of synthesized speech.

triples.name: Spectrogram
triples.relevance: FastPitch generates mel-spectrograms as intermediate representations during the text-to-speech synthesis process.

triples.name: Parallel computing
